LanguageData.DBHSwimmingPool.label: Swimming Pool
LanguageData.DBHSwimmingPool.description: Swimming pool used for hydrotherapy, relaxation or pleasure. Must be filled with water from water towers first.
LanguageData.DBHSwimmingPool_Blueprint.label: Swimming Pool (blueprint)
LanguageData.DBHSwimmingPool_Frame.label: Swimming Pool (building)
LanguageData.DBHSwimmingPool_Frame.description: Swimming pool used for hydrotherapy, relaxation or pleasure. Must be filled with water from water towers first.
LanguageData.HotTub.label: Jacuzzi (Blanco)
LanguageData.HotTub.description: Jacuzzi utilizado para hidroterapia, relajación o placer. Lleno de agua de las torres de agua en su primer uso, autocalentado y sin necesidad de una salida de aguas residuales.
LanguageData.HotTub_Blueprint.label: Jacuzzi (Blanco) (plano)
LanguageData.HotTub_Blueprint_Install.label: Hot Tub (blueprint)
LanguageData.HotTub_Frame.label: Jacuzzi (Blanco) (construcción)
LanguageData.HotTub_Frame.description: Jacuzzi utilizado para hidroterapia, relajación o placer. Lleno de agua de las torres de agua en su primer uso, autocalentado y sin necesidad de una salida de aguas residuales.
LanguageData.WashingMachine.label: Washing Machine
LanguageData.WashingMachine.description: Washes clothes so well that you can't even tell someone died wearing it!
LanguageData.WashingMachine_Blueprint.label: Washing Machine (blueprint)
LanguageData.WashingMachine_Blueprint_Install.label: Washing Machine (blueprint)
LanguageData.WashingMachine_Frame.label: Washing Machine (building)
LanguageData.WashingMachine_Frame.description: Washes clothes so well that you can't even tell someone died wearing it!
